title: Some incorrect post-repo values

body:
Some issue with wrongTimestamp: it throws on CPP with InvalidDifficulty exception, possibly need to make sure that this test is updated 

```
*** [ 05:48:35 | main ] state sync or block import did throw an exception: /home/faiz/ethereum/cpp-ethereum/libethcore/BlockInfo.cpp(242): Throw in function void dev::eth::BlockInfo::verifyParent(const dev::eth::BlockInfo&) const
Dynamic exception type: boost::exception_detail::clone_impl<dev::eth::InvalidDifficulty>
std::exception::what: std::exception
[dev::tag_comment*] = Malformed block 
[dev::tag_required*] = 131136
[dev::tag_got*] = 131072
```
We updated our test runner so this isn't really such an issue - although that wrongTimestamp issue might still be .
